location: Jianguo North Road, 50m from Jingan Park MRT
notes: First-floor 3BR/2BA unit with front and rear courtyards in elevator building. Medium-level renovation suggests decent but not brand-new condition. Ground floor with courtyards could be good for a baby (no stairs inside, outdoor space), but first-floor units may have less natural light and privacy concerns. Direct owner listing with included parking. No photos available to assess baby safety features like railings or sharp corners.
